thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 82 of 625
thread.title: MM

author: MM
title: MM
text: For the average price of $25 for a pair of pants and a top, with solid quality pieces, Fabletics is a great product. I would, however like to note the the VIP members do NOT get access to all that is available. For example, I wanted a pair of leggings that came in a plum color, but they were not offered to VIPs, only non-VIP members so for the lower price per piece, you also get fewer choices
